parameters.name: DataCenter
parameters.description:
The data center. It must be the same as the data center that was specified when you called the [CreateLiveMessageApp](~~2848162~~) operation to create the interactive messaging application.

>  Valid values: cn-shanghai and ap-southeast-1 (Singapore).

parameters.name: ExceptUsers
parameters.description: The users whom you do not want to mute when the group is muted.
